items.title: 'Overname Sevilla flopt, Sergio Ramos op vinkentouw'
items.summary: De overname van Sevilla is naar verluidt spaakgelopen. De huidige eigenaren hoopten de Spaanse club te verkopen aan een Amerikaanse partij, maar die heeft het aanvankelijke bod flink laten zakken. Sergio Ramos heeft volgens Spaanse media ook wel oren naar investeren in zijn jeugdliefde.

items.title: Chelsea confirm Maresca exit amid poor PL run
items.summary: Chelsea confirmed Thursday they have parted ways with manager Enzo Maresca ahead of Sunday's game against Manchester City.

items.title: Wrexham boost playoff chances, sink Blackburn
items.summary: A stunning volley from Ollie Rathbone helped Wrexham to a 2-0 win over Blackburn Rovers.

items.title: Coventry held by Charlton as form wobble continues
items.summary: Championship leaders Coventry concede more ground to the chasing pack as their festive hangover continues with a 1-1 draw against struggling Charlton.

items.title: Marcotti's 2026 wishes: A big World Cup (with Italy in it), transparency in football, more
items.summary: Gab Marcotti rings in the new year by writing down what he hopes to see in football in 2026, above all else: a safe, fun and clean World Cup.

items.title: Roque Santa Cruz (44) weet van geen ophouden en gaat door in Paraguay
items.summary: Op 44-jarige leeftijd gaat spits Roque Santa Cruz vrolijk door met profvoetbal. De Paraguayaan keerde in 2016 terug naar zijn thuisland en gaat voor inmiddels zijn derde verschillende club uit dat land spelen.

items.title: VI Live: Slot zet Frimpong rechtsbuiten bij Liverpool
items.summary: Namens de redactie van VI nogmaals de beste wensen! Op deze nieuwjaarsdag is er traditioneel voetbal uit de Premier League. Uiteraard volgen we dat in deze VI Live allemaal op de voet.. Veel plezier.

items.title: 'Vorige zomer in beeld bij PSV, nu tekent Bayern-doelman bij Southampton'
items.summary: Daniel Peretz staat op het punt om de overstap te maken naar Southampton. De 25-jarige Isra√´lische doelman, die afgelopen zomer nog in beeld was bij PSV , wordt naar verluidt door zijn werkgever Bayern M√ºnchen teruggehaald van Hamburger SV en verhuurd aan Southampton.

items.title: What went wrong between Chelsea and Maresca?
items.summary: Less than six months after guiding Chelsea to Club World Cup success, Enzo Maresca has left. But how did things unravel?

items.title: Anderson ends run of cult hero Hood to reach Worlds semi-finals
items.summary: Gary Anderson charged into the World Darts Championship semi-finals for the eighth time in his career with victory over Ally Pally cult hero Justin Hood on New Year's Day.

items.title: Kabral Du Mathan oozes class in Relkeel romp
items.summary: Kabral Du Mathan sprinted clear of his rivals to run out a comfortable winner of the Dornan Engineering Relkeel Hurdle at Cheltenham.

items.title: Ollie Rathbone‚Äôs sublime volley helps Wrexham brush aside woeful Blackburn
items.summary: Rovers slump to 2-0 defeat after insipid home display Sam Smith also scores for visitors as they rise to eighth Ollie Rathbone marked his first league start of the campaign with a goal-of-the-season contender as Wrexham brushed aside Blackburn 2-0 to rack up their third straight Championship win. Phil Parkinson‚Äôs side were without an away win in eight outings and made the trip to Ewood Park without the injured duo Kieffer Moore and Josh Windass. But Sam Smith and Rathbone deputised to devastating effect as Wrexham flew out of the traps and Smith finished clinically in the 11th minute for his second goal of the season. This report will update later. Continue reading...

items.title: Gabon ditch Aubameyang and suspend national team after ‚Äòdisgraceful‚Äô Afcon
items.summary: Coach Thierry Mouyouma also sacked by government Veteran defender Bruno Ecuele Manga ditched too Gabon‚Äôs government has announced the suspension of the national football team, the sacking of their coach and the kicking of Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang off the squad in the wake of three defeats at the Africa Cup of Nations finals. Gabon‚Äôs acting sports minister announced on television the suspension of the national team after they finished last in their group and were eliminated from the tournament in Morocco. Continue reading...

items.title: Man Utd have Mateta interest with club also monitoring Rennes defender Jacquet
items.summary: Manchester United have a long-term interest in Crystal Palace striker Jean-Philippe Mateta.

items.title: Enzo Maresca leaves Chelsea after holding talks over Manchester City move
items.summary: Italian departs Stamford Bridge role after 18 months Maresca told bosses he discussed replacing Guardiola Enzo Maresca‚Äôs shock departure at Chelsea came after he informed the club that he had held talks with figures associated to Manchester City over replacing Pep Guardiola. Chelsea have been weighed down by uncertainty ever since cracks in Maresca‚Äôs relationship with the board became apparent last month, but there is a feeling at Stamford Bridge that the Italian was looking to engineer an exit before a parting of the ways was confirmed on Thursday morning. Continue reading...
